message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. I'm interested in the product but I can only offer $85 right now. What do you think?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $120 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I'm thinking of a price of $110 now. What do you think?
Alice, $110 is still a bit high for me. I'm really interested in the product but my limit is $90. If you're willing to go down to that, I'll buy it right away.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $95, but I don't think I can go any lower than that. What do you think?
